title: ICE when trying to call closure in const fn w feature const_trait_impl

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code [Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=93d552fbeb987980256c88986d12fa29) ```rust #![feature(const_trait_impl)] const fn foo() -> u32 { let f = || 42; f() } fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.56.0-nightly (2827db2b1 2021-08-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2827db2b137e899242e81f1beea39ae26e245153 commit-date: 2021-08-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.56.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling ice v0.1.0 (/home/albin/rust/ice) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/collect.rs:1885:13: to get the signature of a closure, use `substs.as_closure().sig()` not `fn_sig()` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1034:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.56.0-nightly (2827db2b1 2021-08-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [fn_sig] computing function signature of `foo::{closure#0}` #1 [mir_const_qualif] const checking `foo` end of query stack error: could not compile `ice` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1034:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_typeck::collect::fn_sig 8: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 9: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 12: ::fn_sig 13: ::visit_terminator 14: rustc_mir::transform::check_consts::check::Checker::check_body 15: rustc_mir::transform::mir_const_qualif 16: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 17: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 18: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 19: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 21: ::mir_const_qualif 22: rustc_middle::mir::query::::mir_const_qualif_opt_const_arg 23: rustc_mir::transform::mir_promoted 24: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 25: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 27: ::mir_promoted 28: rustc_mir::borrow_check::mir_borrowck 29: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 30: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 31: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 32: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 33: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 34: ::mir_borrowck 35: rustc_middle::ty::::par_body_owners 36: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 37: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 38: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 39: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_eval_always_task 40: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 41: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 42: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 43: ::analysis 44: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 45: rustc_span::with_source_map 46: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 47: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
